name: Underworld Island
storyline: A father who took his daughter to find his wife on a small island discovered the island is full of supernatural things, which are as creepy as the name of this island "Huangquan". The widespread ghost fog brings unknown dangers, constantly threatening the safety of his daughter and him. A little girl in red always haunts him like a ghost and there is no way for him to escape with his daughter, not even death itself !
summary: Underworld Island is a Full Motion Video (FMV) horror thriller interactive story game. Discover the truth about the Samsara on the Underworld Island. You must make the right choice every step of the way to save your daughterh. The game is developped and published by Mountain & Sea Studio.
